roleset.name: determine, measure, estimation, act of measuring
roleset.note: GAUGE-V NOTES: Based on inancial subcorpus. Comparison with 'determine'.Member of VN classes estimate-34.2, price-54.4. (from gauge.01-v)
GAUGE-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on gauge-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls estimate-34.2, price-54.4. (from gauge.01-n)

roles.note: Watch out for usages that refer to the standard of measurement rather than the act of 'gauging'. Args 2 and 3 expected to be rare. (from gauge.01-n)

example.name: not a good example
example.text: Because it's impossible *trace* to gauge how long the walkout by 55,000 Machinists rank and file will last, the precise impact on Boeing's sales, earnings, cash flow and short-term investment position couldn't be determined.
example.arg: how long the walkout by 55,000 Machinists rank and file will last

example.name: with attribute
example.text: Mary gauged the depths of John's depravity as bottomless.

example.name: Another
example.text: In such case, the manufacturer shall also record on the Form 179 the result of his gauge of the spirits received.

example.name: NOT EVENTIVE. .YY!
example.text: Martin uses body weight as his gauge of maternal metabolic rate.

example.name: Args 0, 1
example.text: He couldn't have been that far off in the dose, in his gauge of its weight.
